channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Bugzilla

item.title: CVE-2018-5123|2024-08-05T05:26:46.948Z -- mozilla -- bugzilla
item.description: A third party website can access information available to a user with access to a restricted bug entry using the image generation in report.cgi in all Bugzilla versions prior to 4.4.
